Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable<Event>
      • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<ViewEvent>

    public class Controller
extends Observable<Event>
implements Observer<ViewEvent>
    The main Controller class that handles the communication between the Model and the Views
